data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti, Georgia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti, Georgia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 659 believers living in Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti, Georgia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Azerbaijani people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 38,443 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, guide seekers in Racha-Lechkhumi-Kvemo Svaneti, Georgia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
